name: Black Bean and Corn Salsa
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can black beans, rinsed and drained
11 oz can whole kernel corn, drained
1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro (or substitute 1 tsp dried cilantro)
1/4 cup fresh lime juice (about 2 limes, squeezed)
tortilla chips for dipping (scoop chips work best)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except avocado and chips. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours. Add avacodo just before serving. Serve with chips.
